file_drop_widget module

class file_drop_widget.FileDropWidget(title, file_pattern, callback, style)[source]

Bases: QWidget

dragEnterEvent(event: QDragEnterEvent)[source]

Handle the drag event. Only accept it if the dragged item matches the regex pattern.

Parameters:

event (QDragEnterEvent) – The event triggered when a file is dragged over the widget.

dropEvent(event)[source]

Triggered when one or more files are dropped onto the widget. Save each file to target and call callback.

property target_path

Get the target path.

update_file(source_file)[source]

Save the dropped file to the target path and call callback for app to handle the file

Parameters:

source_file (str) – The path of the file being dragged.
